name: Speed Cleaner - Prod121 Project
description:
A small game made in my second semester of game design at university. Made by a group of three, my role being primarily programming.

Uploading to keep track of as a potential piece to begin a portfolio.

Feel free to play! We made this game over three weeks for an assignment :)

The house is a tip, and you have to clean as much as possible until your parents arrive home. Find and equip the vacuum to clean the dirt inside, and find the lawn mower to cut the grass outside. But hurry - you only have three minutes!
